metadata.name: In Paradise
metadata.description:
"Between the two of you, I think our little stay here in paradise might not be as bad as you think." - Chapter 6: The Island

Thari H. (Opuscula Creates) is an Indonesian-based illustrator. She usually paints in dreamy, fantasy, characters/landscapes that contain details, bright colors, and organic combinations. Mainly creating in warm feelings related to happiness, excitement, pleasure, and sometimes a plaintive sense, she hopes that these feelings naturally soak into people's hearts.
